ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( !ISBLANK(TEXT(cgcloud__Planning_Mode__c ) ), IF( OR( ISBLANK(cgcloud__Frequency__c), cgcloud__Frequency__c <= 0 , cgcloud__Frequency__c < cgcloud__Start_Week__c ), true, false) , false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Frequency must be a number greater than 0 and higher or equal to StartWeek if the Planning Mode isn't 'None'.
